name: Fancy Filter – Category based filter
author: Sharabindu

sections.description:
View Demo | Docs| Get Premium Version

“Fancy Filter” is category based filter that creates amazing portfolio and post filters. This plugin provides powerful isotope portfolio Gallery with beautiful animated filtering with masonry.

Its most powerful feature is that you can create unlimited shortcodes. If you want, you can create shortcodes with different categories and use multiple filters per page

Fancy Filter includes amazing features, attractive layout design, amazing button styles, popup images and over 40+ control settings that help the user to easily customize.

Free Version

  • Unlimited Shortcode Created
  • Unlimited Filter Created
  • Fancy Portfolio [fancyfilter_portfolio]
  • Blog Post Filter [fancyfilter_blog]
  • Permalink changeable for fancy filters. readmore
  • Popup Image Gallery
  • 2 ,3,4 column layouts
  • Pagination
  • Read more button
  • Fully responsive design
  • Super customized addon
  • All browsers supported
  • Clean coding, validate W3C
  • Well documented

Premium Version

  • WooCommerce Support(Product Filter) view demo
  • 10+ unique designs
  • 12+ Cool Button designs
  • Popup content with image gallery
  • Popup video for the item
  • Popup Short code Support
  • Popup raw html Support
  • Preview & Download Metabox

Get Premium Version
sections.installation:
Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress and select Plugins > Add new
Search for “Fancy Fiter
Click “Install” and “activate”.
sections.faq:
How to change default permalink for fancy filters

please see the documentaion

Can I create multiple filters per page?

Yes, you can have multiple filters with different categories per page

Will it work all themes

yes, it will works on All themes.

  • Permalink Change option for fancy filter.

1.0.3

1.0.5

  • Fixing Clickable issues.

1.0.6

  • Compatibility Update
